desc: Clare’s art is abstract, sophisticated, always vibrant & bright, a bit whacky, with hidden elements, layers and details. They are certainly a true representation of Clare’s personality, heart and mind. What’s for sure, Clare’s work grabs your attention and demands that you take a closer look!

layout.text:
Clare’s art is abstract, sophisticated, always vibrant & bright, a bit whacky, with hidden elements, layers and details. They are certainly a true representation of Clare’s personality, heart and mind.

What’s for sure, Clare’s work grabs your attention and demands that you take a closer look!
